summary: A recur-statement performs a tail-recursive invocation of the enclosing function.
details: The return-type of the enclosing function can be void.
The return-type of the enclosing function can be non-void.
static-checks: There must be exactly one argument for each parameter in the enclosing function.
The type of each argument must be either a primitive-type or a reference-type.
The type of argumenti must be assignable to the type of parameteri of the enclosing function.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A// TODO%0A}
